panels.title: Active Cluster Warnings
panels.description: Nodes reporting abnormal status, errors, or high load. Should be empty in a healthy cluster.

queries.query: SELECT host_name, value FROM scylla_node_operation_mode WHERE value != 3 LIMIT 10

panels.title: Node Operation Mode
panels.description: Current operation mode of each node (normal, joining, leaving, etc)

panels.title: Live Nodes
panels.description: Number of live nodes seen by gossip

panels.title: Unreachable Nodes
panels.description: Number of unreachable nodes

panels.title: Total Reads/sec
panels.description: Cluster-wide read operations per second

panels.title: Total Writes/sec
panels.description: Cluster-wide write operations per second

panels.title: Avg CPU Utilization
panels.description: Average reactor CPU utilization. >80% sustained indicates bottleneck

panels.title: Error Rate
panels.description: Cluster-wide failed operations rate. Non-zero requires investigation

panels.title: Pending Compactions
panels.description: Total pending compactions cluster-wide

panels.title: Cache Hit Rate
panels.description: Average partition cache hit ratio

panels.title: CQL Connections
panels.description: Active CQL connections per node

panels.title: Gossip Heartbeat Rate
panels.description: Rate of gossip heartbeats between nodes

panels.title: HTTP Connections
panels.description: Active HTTP API connections

panels.title: Scylla Version
panels.description: Current ScyllaDB version running on cluster nodes.

queries.query: SELECT DISTINCT version as "ScyllaDB Version" FROM "scylla_scylladb_current_version" WHERE version != '' LIMIT 1

panels.title: Bootstrap Status
panels.description: Node bootstrap completion percentage. 1.0 = fully bootstrapped and ready.

panels.title: Total Reads Rate
panels.description: Rate of successful read operations per node

panels.title: Total Writes Rate
panels.description: Rate of successful write operations per node

panels.title: Failed Reads Rate
panels.description: Rate of failed read operations. Non-zero requires investigation

panels.title: Failed Writes Rate
panels.description: Rate of failed write operations

panels.title: CQL Reads Rate
panels.description: Rate of CQL read requests

panels.title: CQL Deletes Rate
panels.description: Rate of CQL delete requests

panels.title: Avg Read Latency
panels.description: Average read latency from coordinator perspective

panels.title: Avg Write Latency
panels.description: Average write latency from coordinator perspective

panels.title: Read/Write Timeouts Rate
panels.description: Rate of timed-out operations. Indicates overload or network issues

panels.title: Read/Write Unavailable Rate
panels.description: Rate of unavailable errors due to insufficient replicas

panels.title: Background Read Repairs
panels.description: Rate of background read repair operations

panels.title: Coordinator Foreground Ops
panels.description: Pending foreground read/write requests at coordinator

panels.title: Reactor Stalls
panels.description: Stall detector events. Non-zero indicates performance degradation

panels.title: Transport Connections Shed
panels.description: CQL connections shed due to overload. Non-zero = connection storms

panels.title: Range Tombstone Reads
panels.description: Rate of range tombstones processed during reads. High values indicate delete-heavy workloads affecting read performance.

panels.title: Tables per Keyspace
panels.description: Number of tables in each keyspace. Shows keyspace structure at a glance.

panels.title: Keyspace Size (Total Disk)
panels.description: Total disk space used per keyspace. Sum of all tables in each keyspace.

panels.title: SSTables per Keyspace
panels.description: Total number of SSTables across all tables in each keyspace.

panels.title: CQL Reads per Keyspace
panels.description: Rate of CQL SELECT requests per keyspace

panels.title: CQL Deletes per Keyspace
panels.description: Rate of CQL DELETE requests per keyspace

panels.title: Table Disk Usage
panels.description: Live disk space used per table

panels.title: Total Disk Space per Table
panels.description: Total disk space including compaction overhead

panels.title: Live SSTables per Table
panels.description: Number of live SSTables per table. High counts may indicate compaction issues

panels.title: Read Latency per Table (P99)
panels.description: 99th percentile read latency per table

panels.title: Write Latency per Table (P99)
panels.description: 99th percentile write latency per table

panels.title: Memtable Writes per Table
panels.description: Rate of partition and row writes to memtable per table

panels.title: Memtable Flushes per Table
panels.description: Rate of memtable switches (flushes) per table

panels.title: View Updates
panels.description: Rate of view updates applied locally and sent to remote replicas

panels.title: View Update Failures
panels.description: Rate of failed view updates. Non-zero indicates view sync issues

panels.title: RPC Connections by Datacenter
panels.description: RPC client connections grouped by datacenter (FR, NY, SG).

panels.title: Avg Read Latency per Keyspace
panels.description: Average read latency aggregated per keyspace.

panels.title: Avg Write Latency per Keyspace
panels.description: Average write latency aggregated per keyspace.

panels.title: Reads per Keyspace (All Tables)
panels.description: Read throughput aggregated by keyspace (sum of all tables).

panels.title: Partition Cache Hit Ratio
panels.description: Ratio of partition cache hits to total lookups. Higher is better (aim >90%)

panels.title: Row Cache Hit Ratio
panels.description: Ratio of row cache hits to total lookups

panels.title: Cache Memory Usage
panels.description: Memory allocated vs used for caching

panels.title: Total Memory
panels.description: Total, allocated, and free memory breakdown per node

panels.title: LSA Memory
panels.description: Log-Structured Allocator memory usage and free space

panels.title: Dirty Memory
panels.description: Memory containing unflushed data

panels.title: Cached Partitions
panels.description: Number of partitions currently in cache

panels.title: Cached Rows
panels.description: Number of rows currently in cache

panels.title: Active Cache Reads
panels.description: Number of reads currently in progress from cache

panels.title: Cache Evictions Rate
panels.description: Rate of partition and row evictions from cache. High = cache pressure

panels.title: Cache Insertions Rate
panels.description: Rate of new partitions and rows added to cache

panels.title: Concurrent Cache Misses (Same Key)
panels.description: Concurrent misses on same key. High = hot keys

panels.title: Prepared Statements Cache Size
panels.description: Number of entries in the prepared statements cache. Higher = more cached queries.

panels.title: Prepared Cache Evictions
panels.description: Rate of prepared statements evicted from cache. High rates may indicate insufficient cache size.

panels.title: Active Compactions
panels.description: Number of active compaction tasks. High may impact read/write

panels.title: Pending Compactions
panels.description: Compactions waiting to run. Growing backlog = storage pressure

panels.title: Compaction Backlog
panels.description: Total compaction work pending. High values impact read perf

panels.title: Completed/Failed Compactions Rate
panels.description: Rate of completed and failed compactions

panels.title: SSTables Open
panels.description: Number of currently open SSTables

panels.title: SSTable Read Queue Overloads
panels.description: Times SSTable read queue was overloaded. Non-zero = reads arriving faster than served

panels.title: Commitlog Disk Usage
panels.description: Commit log disk space usage

panels.title: Commitlog Pending Flushes
panels.description: Pending commit log flushes. High = disk I/O bottleneck

panels.title: Memtable Pending Flushes
panels.description: Memtables waiting to flush. High = storage pressure

panels.title: Bloom Filter Efficiency
panels.description: SSTables checked vs survived. Lower survival = more efficient

panels.title: CPU Utilization
panels.description: Reactor CPU utilization percentage per node

panels.title: CPU Busy Time Rate
panels.description: Total CPU busy time rate in milliseconds

panels.title: AIO Operations Rate
panels.description: Async I/O read and write operations rate

panels.title: AIO Bytes Throughput
panels.description: Async I/O read and write throughput

panels.title: I/O Queue Length
panels.description: I/O queue length. High = I/O bottleneck

panels.title: IO Queue Activations by Class
panels.description: IO queue activations by workload class

panels.title: Scheduler Queue Length
panels.description: Tasks queued in scheduler. High = processing backlog

panels.title: Scheduler Runtime
panels.description: Scheduler runtime in milliseconds

panels.title: Scheduler Tasks Processed
panels.description: Rate of scheduler tasks processed

panels.title: Scheduler Starvation Time
panels.description: Time tasks spent starved for CPU. Indicates overload

panels.title: Hints Written/Sent Rate
panels.description: Rate of hints written and sent. High hints = cluster issues

panels.title: Hints Dropped/Errors Rate
panels.description: Rate of dropped hints and errors. Non-zero = data loss risk

panels.title: Repair Row Transfer Rate
panels.description: Rate of rows sent and received during repairs

panels.title: Repair Byte Transfer Rate
panels.description: Rate of bytes transferred during repairs

panels.title: Batchlog Replay Rate
panels.description: Rate of batchlog replay attempts

panels.title: Cross-Shard Operations
panels.description: Operations crossing shard boundaries. High = hot partitions

panels.title: RPC Client Connections
panels.description: RPC client connections by domain (gossip/statement/streaming)

panels.title: Raft Entries Added
panels.description: Rate of Raft log entries added (command, config, dummy)

panels.title: Raft Entries Applied
panels.description: Rate of Raft log entries applied (committed)

panels.title: Streaming Throughput
panels.description: Data streaming rate for repair and bootstrap

panels.title: Active Reads Memory
panels.description: Memory consumed by active read operations. High may cause drops

panels.title: Pending View Updates Size
panels.description: Bytes pending in view update queue. Growing = backlog
